eventlist.title: Pottery Workshop
eventlist.description: Craft and create your own pottery pieces while supporting local craftmanship.

eventlist.title: Online Auction
eventlist.description: Participate in online auctions featuring limited pottery items crafted by the hands of the Dharavi community.

eventlist.title: Pottery Sales
eventlist.description: Purchase pottery from our sales and exhibition showcasing the work of Dharavi artisans.
